snippet: The parent company of British Airways is also in talks with American, which has been in Chapter 11 protection since November.
abstract: American Airlines and US Airways announce that they have started confidential merger talks; merger would put the combined airline on par with the world’s largest, United Continental Holdings, and the slightly smaller Delta Air Lines.
lead_paragraph: The parent company of British Airways is also in talks with American, which has been in Chapter 11 protection since November.

headline.main: American Airlines and US Airways Enter Merger Talks
headline.print_headline: American Airlines and US Airways Enter Merger Talks
